name: Capital Magnet Fund
objective: The Capital Magnet Fund helps to create and preserve affordable housing for low-income families, individuals, and economically distressed communities by attracting private capital. Grants are used to support financing for the preservation, rehabilitation, development or purchase of affordable housing as well as select related economic development and community facilities that serve residents of these communities.
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
